Vulnerability.name: Oracle CPU 2010年4月: 审计
Vulnerability.Description: 在Oracle数据库中的审计组件存在不明漏洞9.2.0.8，9.2.0.8DV，10.1.0.5，10.2.0.4和11.1.0.7允许远程认证用户影响诚信，关系到" SELECT，INSERT或DELETE。上表接受审计"
Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已经发布了升级补丁以修复此安全问题，补丁获取链接： http://www.oracle.com/technology/deploy/security/critical-patch-updates/cpuapr2010.html

Vulnerability.name: Oracle CPU 2010年4月: 改变数据捕获
Vulnerability.Description: 在Oracle数据库9.2.0.8和9.2.0.8DV变更数据捕获组件存在不明漏洞允许远程认证用户影响机密性和完整性，有关SYS.DBMS_CDC_PUBLISH。
Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已经发布了升级补丁以修复此安全问题，补丁获取链接： http://www.oracle.com/technology/deploy/security/critical-patch-updates/cpuapr2010.html

Vulnerability.name: Oracle自定义视图权限提升漏洞
Vulnerability.Description: Oracle数据库9.2.0.0至10.2.0.3版本允许拥有"SELECT"权限的本地用户通过创建一个视图导致基表中插入，更新，或删除数据，然后执行视图上的操作。
Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商还没有提供补丁或者升级程序，我们建议使用此软件的用户随时关注厂商的主页以获取最新版本： http://www.oracle.com

Vulnerability.name: Oracle安全警告 - CVE-2012-1675
Vulnerability.Description: TNS监听器，如用于Oracle数据库11g11.1.0.7版本，11.2.0.2版本，11.2.0.3版本，10g10.2.0.3版本，10.2.0.4版本和10.2.0.5版本， Oracle Fusion Middleware, Enterprise Manager, E-Business Suite和其他可能的产品，允许远程攻击者通过执行数据库(1)实例或(2)已经存在的服务名称的远程登记执行任意数据库命令，然后进行中间人(MITM)攻击劫持数据库连接，又名"TNS Poison."。
Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已经发布了升级补丁以修复此安全问题，补丁获取链接： http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/topics/security/alert-cve-2012-1675-1608180.html

Vulnerability.name: Oracle 数据库链接密码缓冲区溢出
Vulnerability.Description: Oracle Database服务器 9i发行2版本及之前版本中Oracle Net服务中的堆栈缓冲区溢出允许远程攻击者通过含长的USING参数的连接字符串的"CREATE DATABASE LINK"执行任意代码。
Vulnerability.Solutions: 厂商补丁： Oracle ------ Oracle已经为此发布了一个安全公告(OracleSA#54)以及相应补丁: OracleSA#54：Buffer Overflow in Oracle Net Services for Oracle Database Server 链接： http://otn.oracle.com/deploy/security/pdf/2003alert54.pdf 补丁下载： 补丁号如下： 操作平台 9.2.0.2 9.0.1.4 8.1.7.4 8.0.6.3 Sun Solaris (32-bit) 2749511 2760944 2784635 2760879 Sun Solaris (64-bit) 2749511 2760944 2784635 N/A IBM AIX 4.3.3 and 5L (32-bit) N/A N/A 2784635 2760879 IBM AIX 4.3.3 (64-bit) 2749511 2760944 2784635 2760879 IBM AIX Based 5L(64-bit) 2749511 N/A N/A N/A MS Windows NT/2000/XP 2761332 ECD: 2376472 2845564 May 2003 HP-UX (32-bit) N/A N/A 2784635 2760879 HP-UX (64-bit) 2749511 2760944 2784635 2760879 HP Tru64 2749511 2760944 2784635 2760879 LINUX 2749511 2760944 2784635 N/A LINUX 390 2749511 N/A N/A N/A LINUX IA64 N/A N/A N/A N/A INTEL SOLARIS N/A N/A N/A N/A DATA GENERAL N/A N/A N/A N/A UNIXWARE N/A N/A 2784635 N/A IBM NUMA-Q N/A N/A 2784635 ECD: MAY 2003 SGI-IRIX-64 N/A N/A N/A N/A Siemens-64 N/A N/A N/A N/A Novell N/A N/A N/A N/A OpenVMS N/A 2760944 2784635 N/A IBM OS/390 (MVS) 2749511 2760944 N/A N/A NEC N/A N/A N/A N/A HP IA64 N/A N/A N/A N/A Fujitsu UXP/DS N/A N/A N/A 2760879 Hitachi RISC Unix N/A N/A N/A 2760879 客户可以登录站点，提交相关补丁号下载补丁进行修补： http://metalink.oracle.com

Vulnerability.name: Oracle DBMS_AQADM_SYS SQL注入
Vulnerability.Description: Oracle Database9.0.1.5, 9.2.0.7,和10.1.0.5 中的SYS.DBMS_AQADM_SYS数据包的SQL注入漏洞，能让远程认证用户注入任意SQL指令，通过未知的向量，又叫DB04. 请注意：从20070424开始，Oracle还没有关于DB04支持多重漏洞的质疑声明。
Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已经发布了升级补丁以修复这个安全问题，请到厂商的主页下载,下载并安装更新：https://www.oracle.com/security-alerts/

Vulnerability.name: Oracle DBMS_DEFER_INTERNAL_SYS 缓冲区溢出
Vulnerability.Description: Oracle的DBMS_DEFER_INTERNAL_SYS数据包中存在缓冲区溢出漏洞。数据包上有执行权限的攻击者可以在系统上执行任意代码，提升权限或导致数据库崩溃。
Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商还没有提供此漏洞的相关补丁或者升级程序，建议使用此软件的用户随时关注厂商的主页以获取最新版本： https://www.alice-dsl.de/

Vulnerability.name: Oracle DBMS_DEFER_INTERNAL_SYS 缓冲区溢出
Vulnerability.Description: Oracle的DBMS_DEFER_INTERNAL_SYS数据包中存在缓冲区溢出漏洞。数据包上有执行权限的攻击者可以在系统上执行任意代码，提升权限或导致数据库崩溃。
Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商还没有提供此漏洞的相关补丁或者升级程序，建议使用此软件的用户随时关注厂商的主页以获取最新版本： https://www.alice-dsl.de/

Vulnerability.name: Oracle DBMS_LOGREP_UTIL 缓冲区溢出
Vulnerability.Description: Oracle Database 9.2.0.7 和 10.1.0.5版本中存在多个不明漏洞，含有与(1)导出 和 sys.dbms_logrep_util (DB08), 和(2) Oracle Streams 和 sys.dbms_capture_adm_internal权限(DB09)相关的未知影响和攻击向量。 注意：Oracle还没争辩可靠研究声明ORACLE创建一个默认账户，用户ID "PN"和密码"PN"。如果可能的话最好的做法是清除默认帐户。对于系统所需帐户，应该改变默认密码。此帐户授予用户级访问系统。
Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已经发布了升级补丁以修复这个安全问题，请到厂商的主页下载,下载并安装更新：https://www.oracle.com/security-alerts/

Vulnerability.name: Oracle DBMS_LOGREP_UTIL 缓冲区溢出
Vulnerability.Description: Oracle Database 9.2.0.7 和 10.1.0.5版本中存在多个不明漏洞，含有与(1)导出 和 sys.dbms_logrep_util (DB08), 和(2) Oracle Streams 和 sys.dbms_capture_adm_internal权限(DB09)相关的未知影响和攻击向量。 注意：Oracle还没争辩可靠研究声明ORACLE创建一个默认账户，用户ID "PN"和密码"PN"。如果可能的话最好的做法是清除默认帐户。对于系统所需帐户，应该改变默认密码。此帐户授予用户级访问系统。
Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已经发布了升级补丁以修复这个安全问题，请到厂商的主页下载,下载并安装更新：https://www.oracle.com/security-alerts/

Vulnerability.name: Oracle DBMS_REPCAT_UNTRUSTED UNREGISTER_SNAPSHOT 缓冲区溢出
Vulnerability.Description: Oracle Database 9.0.1.5, 9.2.0.7 和 10.1.0.5中多个未明漏洞有未知影响和与(1)Advanced Queuing组件和sys.dbms_aqsys.dbms_aq权限(DB01),(2)Advanced Replication和sys.dbms_repcat_untrusted (DB07),以及(3)Oracle文本和ctxload (DB15)有关的攻击向量。注意:Oracle还没由可靠研究者公开声明，DB01用于SYS.DBMS_AQ_INV数据包中的SQL注入的，DB07用于DBMS_REPCAT_UNTRUSTED数据包中UNREGISTER_SNAPSHOT程序的缓冲区溢出。
Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已经发布了升级补丁以修复这个安全问题，补丁下载链接： http://www.oracle.com/technology/deploy/security/critical-patch-updates/cpujan2007.html?_template=/o

Vulnerability.name: Oracle DBMS_REPCAT_UNTRUSTED UNREGISTER_SNAPSHOT 缓冲区溢出
Vulnerability.Description: Oracle Database 9.0.1.5, 9.2.0.7 和 10.1.0.5中多个未明漏洞有未知影响和与(1)Advanced Queuing组件和sys.dbms_aqsys.dbms_aq权限(DB01),(2)Advanced Replication和sys.dbms_repcat_untrusted (DB07),以及(3)Oracle文本和ctxload (DB15)有关的攻击向量。注意:Oracle还没由可靠研究者公开声明，DB01用于SYS.DBMS_AQ_INV数据包中的SQL注入的，DB07用于DBMS_REPCAT_UNTRUSTED数据包中UNREGISTER_SNAPSHOT程序的缓冲区溢出。
Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已经发布了升级补丁以修复这个安全问题，补丁下载链接： http://www.oracle.com/technology/deploy/security/critical-patch-updates/cpujan2007.html?_template=/o

Vulnerability.name: Oracle EXTPROC缓冲区溢出漏洞
Vulnerability.Description: Oracle9i Database Release 2和 1, 和Oracle 8i的 PL/SQL EXTPROC的函数存在堆栈缓冲区溢出漏洞能让认证数据库用户和任意的数据库用户，在某些情况下通过长库名执行任意代码。
Vulnerability.Solutions: 临时解决方法： 如果您不能立刻安装补丁或者升级，CNNVD建议您采取以下措施以降低威胁： * Oracle建议用户限制用户对CREATE LIBRARY和CREAT ANY LIBRARY的使用。要检查你是否拥有CREATE LIBRARY和CREAT ANY LIBRARY使用权力，可执行如下操作： select grantee, privilege from dba_privilege where privilege like 'CREATE%LIBRARY'; 厂商补丁： Oracle ------ 目前厂商还没有提供补丁或者升级程序，我们建议使用此软件的用户随时关注厂商的主页以获取最新版本： http://www.oracle.com

Vulnerability.name: Oracle FROM_TZ长时区差异参数缓冲区溢出
Vulnerability.Description: Oracle9i 9至9.2.0.3版本中的多个缓冲区溢出漏洞，允许本地用户通过(1)在长值中设置TIME_ZONE 会话参数，或提供长参数给(2)NUMTOYMINTERVAL(3)NUMTODSINTERVAL或(4)FROM_TZ函数来执行任意代码。
Vulnerability.Solutions: 厂商补丁： Oracle ------ Oracle 9i Database Release 2, version 9.2.0.3已经修正此漏洞，要更多Oracle安全补丁信息，请访问Oracle Metalink site： http://metalink.oracle.com

Vulnerability.name: Oracle长用户名缓冲区溢出
Vulnerability.Description: Oracle数据库服务器9i版本，8i版本，8.1.7版本和8.0.6版本的ORACLE.EXE中的缓冲区溢出漏洞允许远程攻击者通过在登录过程中提供的很长的用户名执行任意代码，如可利用通过执行客户端应用程序的验证，如使用LOADPSP所证实。
Vulnerability.Solutions: 厂商补丁： Oracle ------ Oracle已经为此发布了一个安全公告(OracleSA#51)以及相应补丁: OracleSA#51：Buffer Overflow in ORACLE.EXE binary of Oracle9i Database Server 链接： http://otn.oracle.com/deploy/security/pdf/2003alert51.pdf Oracle已经发布补丁号为2620726的补丁，用户可以在Oracle Worldwide Support Services web site下载补丁： http://metalink.oracle.com 点击补丁按钮，进入补丁WEB页面，输入BUG号码2620726下载。

Vulnerability.name: 缺少Oracle高危补丁更新(CPU) 2006年4月
Vulnerability.Description: Oracle Database Server9.2.0.7，10.1.0.4和10.2.0.1版本的Oracle Spatial组件中的未明漏洞有未知的影响和攻击向量，又名Vuln# DB08。
Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已经发布了升级补丁以修复这个安全问题，请到厂商的主页下载,下载并安装更新：https://www.oracle.com/security-alerts/

Vulnerability.name: 缺少Oracle高危补丁更新(CPU) 2009年4月
Vulnerability.Description: 在Oracle数据库9.2.0.8和9.2.0.8DV的资源管理器组件存在不明漏洞允许远程认证用户通过未知向量影响保密性、完整性和可用性。
Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已经发布了升级补丁以修复这个安全问题，请到厂商的主页下载,下载并安装更新：https://www.oracle.com/security-alerts/

Vulnerability.name: Oracle数据库: 高危补丁更新 - 2011年4月 (CVE-2009-3555)
Vulnerability.Description: TLS协议，SSL协议3.0及之前版本，如Microsoft Internet信息服务(IIS)7.0版本，Apache HTTP服务器2.2.14及之前版本的mod_ssl，OpenSSL 0.9.8l之前版本，GnuTLS 2.8.5及之前版本，Mozilla网络安全服务(NSS)3.12.4及之前版本，多种Cisco产品和其他产品所用，未正确与现有的连接进行重新协商握手，中间人攻击者可通过发送追溯至重新谈判情境后的服务器处理的未经验证的请求，将数据插入HTTPS会议和由TLS或SSL保护的其他类型的会话，与"明文注射"攻击相关，又名"Project Mogul"问题。
Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已经发布了升级补丁以修复这个安全问题，补丁下载链接： http://cvs.openssl.org/chngview?cn=18790 http://www.gnu.org/software/gnutls/download.html http://httpd.apache.org/download.cgi

Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已经发布了升级补丁以修复此安全问题，补丁获取链接： http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/topics/security/cpuapr2013-1899555.html

Vulnerability.name: Oracle数据库: 高危补丁更新 - 2014年4月(CVE-2014-2406)
Vulnerability.Description: Oracle数据库服务器11.1.0.7版本，11.2.0.3版本，11.2.0.4版本和12.1.0.1版本的核心RDBMS组件存在未明漏洞，允许远程认证用户通过与"Advisor"和"Select Any Dictionary"特权相关的未知向量影响机密性，完整性和可用性。
Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已经发布了升级补丁以修复此安全问题，补丁获取链接： http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/topics/security/cpuapr2014-1972952.html

Vulnerability.name: Oracle 数据库: 重要补丁更新 - 2017年4月 (CVE-2017-3486)
Vulnerability.Description: Oracle数据库服务器的SQL Plus组件中存在漏洞。受影响的受支持版本为11.2.0.4和12.1.0.2。难以利用漏洞允许具有本地登录权限的高的特权攻击者登录到SQL*Plus执行以危及SQL*Plus的基础设施。成功的攻击需要来自攻击者以外的人员的人际交互，而漏洞处于SQL*Plus中，攻击可能会对其他产品产生重大影响。此漏洞的成功攻击可能导致SQL*Plus的接管。注意：此分数适用于数据库的Windows平台版本11.2.0.4。对于Windows平台版本12.1.0.2和Linux，分数为6.3，范围不变。CVSS 3.0基本评分7.2（保密性、完整性和可用性影响）。CVSS向量：(CVSS:3.0/AV:L/AC:H/PR:H/UI:R/S:C/C:H/I:H/A:H)。
Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已经发布了升级补丁以修复此安全问题，补丁获取链接： http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/security-advisory/cpuapr2017-3236618.html

Vulnerability.name: Oracle 数据库: 重要补丁更新 - 2017年4月 (CVE-2017-3486)
Vulnerability.Description: Oracle数据库服务器的SQL Plus组件中存在漏洞。受影响的受支持版本为11.2.0.4和12.1.0.2。难以利用漏洞允许具有本地登录权限的高的特权攻击者登录到SQL*Plus执行以危及SQL*Plus的基础设施。成功的攻击需要来自攻击者以外的人员的人际交互，而漏洞处于SQL*Plus中，攻击可能会对其他产品产生重大影响。此漏洞的成功攻击可能导致SQL*Plus的接管。注意：此分数适用于数据库的Windows平台版本11.2.0.4。对于Windows平台版本12.1.0.2和Linux，分数为6.3，范围不变。CVSS 3.0基本评分7.2（保密性、完整性和可用性影响）。CVSS向量：(CVSS:3.0/AV:L/AC:H/PR:H/UI:R/S:C/C:H/I:H/A:H)。
Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已经发布了升级补丁以修复此安全问题，补丁获取链接： http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/security-advisory/cpuapr2017-3236618.html

Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已经发布了升级补丁以修复此安全问题，补丁获取链接： http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/security-advisory/cpuapr2017-3236618.html

Vulnerability.name: Oracle 数据库: 重要补丁更新 - 2017年4月 (CVE-2017-3567)
Vulnerability.Description: Oracle数据库服务器的OJVM组件中存在漏洞。受支持的版本为11.2.0.4和12.1.0.2。难以利用的漏洞允许具有Create Session和Create Procedure权限的低权限攻击者通过多种协议危及OJVM。此漏洞的成功攻击可能会导致非法挂起或OJVM的经常重复性崩溃 (完整的DOS)。CVSS 3.0基本分数5.3（可用性影响）。CVSS向量: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:H/PR:L/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:N/A:H)。
Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已经发布了升级补丁以修复此安全问题，补丁获取链接： http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/security-advisory/cpuapr2017-3236618.html

Vulnerability.name: Oracle Database: 关键补丁更新 - 2018年4月 (CVE-2018-2841)
Vulnerability.Description: Vulnerability in the Java VM component of Oracle Database Server. Supported versions that are affected are 11.2.0.4, 12.1.0.2 and 12.2.0.1. Difficult to exploit vulnerability allows low privileged attacker having Create Session, Create Procedure privilege with network access via multiple protocols to compromise Java VM. While the vulnerability is in Java VM, attacks may significantly impact additional products. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in takeover of Java VM. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 8.5 (Confidentiality, Integrity and Availability impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:H/PR:L/UI:N/S:C/C:H/I:H/A:H).
Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已发布升级补丁以修复漏洞，补丁获取链接： http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/security-advisory/cpuapr2018-3678067.html

Vulnerability.name: Oracle数据库:重要补丁更新 - 2019年4月(CVE-2019-2516)
Vulnerability.Description: Vulnerability in the Portable Clusterware component of Oracle Database Server. Supported versions that are affected are 11.2.0.4, 12.1.0.2, 12.2.0.1 and 18c. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows high privileged attacker having Grid Infrastructure User privilege with logon to the infrastructure where Portable Clusterware executes to compromise Portable Clusterware. While the vulnerability is in Portable Clusterware, attacks may significantly impact additional products. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in takeover of Portable Clusterware. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 8.2 (Confidentiality, Integrity and Availability impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:L/AC:L/PR:H/UI:N/S:C/C:H/I:H/A:H).
Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已经发布了升级补丁以修复这个安全问题，请到厂商的主页下载,下载并安装更新：https://www.oracle.com/security-alerts/

Vulnerability.name: Oracle数据库:重要补丁更新 - 2019年4月(CVE-2019-2517)
Vulnerability.Description: Vulnerability in the Core RDBMS component of Oracle Database Server. Supported versions that are affected are 12.2.0.1 and 18c. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows high privileged attacker having DBFS_ROLE privilege with network access via Oracle Net to compromise Core RDBMS. While the vulnerability is in Core RDBMS, attacks may significantly impact additional products. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in takeover of Core RDBMS. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 9.1 (Confidentiality, Integrity and Availability impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:L/PR:H/UI:N/S:C/C:H/I:H/A:H).

Vulnerability.name: Oracle数据库:重要补丁更新 - 2019年4月(CVE-2019-2571)
Vulnerability.Description: Vulnerability in the RDBMS DataPump component of Oracle Database Server. Supported versions that are affected are 11.2.0.4, 12.1.0.2, 12.2.0.1 and 18c. Vulnerability.name: Oracle数据库:重要补丁更新 - 2019年4月(CVE-2019-2582)
Vulnerability.Description: Vulnerability in the Core RDBMS component of Oracle Database Server. Supported versions that are affected are 12.2.0.1 and 18c. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows unauthenticated attacker with network access via Oracle Net to compromise Core RDBMS. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized read access to a subset of Core RDBMS accessible data. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 5.3 (Confidentiality impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:L/I:N/A:N).

Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已经发布了升级补丁以修复此安全问题，补丁获取链接： http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/topics/security/cpujan2011-194091.html

Vulnerability.name: Oracle数据库: 高危补丁更新 - 2011年1月(CVE-2010-3600)
Vulnerability.Description: Oracle Database Server 11.1.0.7 和 11.2.0.1版本以及 Enterprise Manager Grid Control 10.2.0.5版本中的Client System Analyzer组件上的未明漏洞允许远程攻击者通过未知向量影响保密性、完整性和可用性。注意：先前信息由2011年1月CPU获取，Oracle还没评论可靠第三方协调者的声明，此次问题包含一个暴露的JSP脚本，接受XML上传，与未指定参数中空字节结合，允许执行任意代码。
Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已经发布了升级补丁以修复此安全问题，补丁获取链接： http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/topics/security/cpujan2011-194091.html

Vulnerability.name: Oracle数据库: 高危补丁更新 - 2015年1月(CVE-2014-6541)
Vulnerability.Description: Oracle Database Server 11.1.0.7版本,11.2.0.3版本,11.2.0.4版本,12.1.0.1版本,和12.1.0.2版本中的Recovery组件存在未指明漏洞,当在Windows上运行时，允许远程身份验证的用户通过与DBMS_IR相关的向量影响保密性。
Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已经发布了升级补丁以修复此安全问题，补丁获取链接： http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/topics/security/cpujan2015-1972971.html

Vulnerability.name: Oracle数据库: 高危补丁更新 - 2015年1月(CVE-2014-6567)
Vulnerability.Description: Oracle Database Server 11.1.0.7版本, 11.2.0.3版本, 11.2.0.4版本, 12.1.0.1版本, 以及 12.1.0.2版本中Core RDBMS组件存在未指明漏洞，允许远程验证用户通过未知向量影响保密性、完整性和可用性。注意：此前信息来自于2015/01的CPU，Oracle对研究这关于这是DBMS_AW.EXECUTE的堆栈缓冲区溢出的声明未作出评论，这允许通过长Current Directory Alias (CDA)命令执行代码。
Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已经发布了升级补丁以修复此安全问题，补丁获取链接： http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/topics/security/cpujan2015-1972971.html

Vulnerability.name: Oracle数据库: 高危补丁更新 - 2015年1月(CVE-2014-6577)
Vulnerability.Description: Oracle Database Server 11.2.0.3版本, 11.2.0.4版本, 12.1.0.1版本, 和12.1.0.2版本中XML Developer's Kit的C组件中存在未指明漏洞，允许远程认证用户通过未知向量影响保密性。注意：以前的信息来自于2015年1月的CPU。Oracle 还没有对最初研究者关于这是一个在XML解析器众的XML外部实体(XXE)漏洞的声明展开评论,它允许攻击者通过特制的(1)http:或(2)ftp:URI进行内部端口扫描,执行SSRF攻击,或引起拒绝服务。
Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已经发布了升级补丁以修复此安全问题，补丁获取链接： http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/topics/security/cpujan2015-1972971.html

Vulnerability.name: Oracle数据库:关键补丁更新 - 2017年1月 (CVE-2017-3240)
Vulnerability.Description: Oracle数据库服务器的RDBMS安全组件中的漏洞。受影响的受支持版本为12.1.0.2。易受攻击的漏洞允许具有本地登录权限的低特权攻击者登录到RDBMS Security执行的基础架构，从而危及RDBMS安全性。此漏洞的成功攻击可能导致对RDBMS Security可访问数据的一个子集的未经授权的读取访问。CVSS v3.0基础评分3.3（影响保密性）。
Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已经发布了升级补丁以修复此安全问题，补丁获取链接： http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/security-advisory/cpujan2017-2881727.html

Vulnerability.name: Oracle数据库:关键补丁更新 - 2017年1月 (CVE-2017-3240)
Vulnerability.Description: Oracle数据库服务器的RDBMS安全组件中的漏洞。受影响的受支持版本为12.1.0.2。易受攻击的漏洞允许具有本地登录权限的低特权攻击者登录到RDBMS Security执行的基础架构，从而危及RDBMS安全性。此漏洞的成功攻击可能导致对RDBMS Security可访问数据的一个子集的未经授权的读取访问。CVSS v3.0基础评分3.3（影响保密性）。
Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已经发布了升级补丁以修复此安全问题，补丁获取链接： http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/security-advisory/cpujan2017-2881727.html

Vulnerability.name: Oracle数据库:关键补丁更新 - 2017年1月 (CVE-2017-3310)
Vulnerability.Description: Oracle数据库服务器的OJVM组件中存在漏洞。受支持的受影响的版本是11.2.0.4和12.1.0.2。易受攻击的漏洞允许具有创建会话，创建过程权限的低特权攻击者通过多个协议进行网络访问以损害OJVM。成功的攻击需要来自攻击者以外的人的人工交互，而当漏洞在OJVM中时，攻击可能会显着影响其他产品。此漏洞的成功攻击可能控制OJVM。CVSS v3.0基础评分9.0（影响保密性、完整性和可用性）。
Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已经发布了升级补丁以修复此安全问题，补丁获取链接： http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/security-advisory/cpujan2017-2881727.html

Vulnerability.name: Oracle 数据库: 关键补丁更新 - 2018年1月 (CVE-2017-10282)
Vulnerability.Description: Vulnerability in the Core RDBMS component of Oracle Database Server. Supported versions that are affected are 12.1.0.2 and 12.2.0.1. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows high privileged attacker having Create Session, Execute Catalog Role privilege with network access via Oracle Net to compromise Core RDBMS. While the vulnerability is in Core RDBMS, attacks may significantly impact additional products. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in takeover of Core RDBMS. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 9.1 (Confidentiality, Integrity and Availability impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:L/PR:H/UI:N/S:C/C:H/I:H/A:H).
Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已发布升级补丁以修复漏洞，补丁获取链接： http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/security-advisory/cpujan2018-3236628.html

Vulnerability.name: Oracle 数据库: 关键补丁更新 - 2018年1月 (CVE-2017-12617)
Vulnerability.Description: When running Apache Tomcat versions 9.0.0.M1 to 9.0.0, 8.5.0 to 8.5.22, 8.0.0.RC1 to 8.0.46 and 7.0.0 to 7.0.81 with HTTP PUTs enabled (e.g. via setting the readonly initialisation parameter of the Default servlet to false) it was possible to upload a JSP file to the server via a specially crafted request. This JSP could then be requested and any code it contained would be executed by the server.
Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已发布升级补丁以修复漏洞，补丁获取链接： https://bz.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=61542

Vulnerability.name: Oracle 数据库: 关键补丁更新 - 2018年1月 (CVE-2018-2575)
Vulnerability.Description: Vulnerability in the Core RDBMS component of Oracle Database Server. Supported versions that are affected are 11.2.0.4, 12.1.0.2, and 12.2.0.1. Difficult to exploit vulnerability allows high privileged attacker having Local Logon privilege with network access via multiple protocols to compromise Core RDBMS. Successful attacks require human interaction from a person other than the attacker. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized read access to a subset of Core RDBMS accessible data. Note: Applicable only to Windows platform. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 2.0 (Confidentiality impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:H/PR:H/UI:R/S:U/C:L/I:N/A:N).
Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已发布升级补丁以修复漏洞，补丁获取链接： http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/security-advisory/cpujan2018-3236628.html

Vulnerability.name: Oracle 数据库: 关键补丁更新 - 2018年1月 (CVE-2018-2680)
Vulnerability.Description: Vulnerability in the Java VM component of Oracle Database Server. Supported versions that are affected are 11.2.0.4, 12.1.0.2 and 12.2.0.1. Difficult to exploit vulnerability allows unauthenticated attacker with network access via multiple protocols to compromise Java VM. Successful attacks require human interaction from a person other than the attacker and while the vulnerability is in Java VM, attacks may significantly impact additional products. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in takeover of Java VM. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 8.3 (Confidentiality, Integrity and Availability impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:H/PR:N/UI:R/S:C/C:H/I:H/A:H).
Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已发布升级补丁以修复漏洞，补丁获取链接： http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/security-advisory/cpujan2018-3236628.html

Vulnerability.name: Oracle数据库:重要补丁更新 - 2019年1月(CVE-2019-2444)
Vulnerability.Description: Vulnerability in the Core RDBMS component of Oracle Database Server. Supported versions that are affected are 12.2.0.1 and 18c. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows low privileged attacker having Local Logon privilege with logon to the infrastructure where Core RDBMS executes to compromise Core RDBMS. Successful attacks require human interaction from a person other than the attacker and while the vulnerability is in Core RDBMS, attacks may significantly impact additional products. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in takeover of Core RDBMS. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 8.2 (Confidentiality, Integrity and Availability impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:L/AC:L/PR:L/UI:R/S:C/C:H/I:H/A:H).

Vulnerability.name: Oracle数据库:重要补丁更新 - 2019年1月(CVE-2019-2444)
Vulnerability.Description: Vulnerability in the Core RDBMS component of Oracle Database Server. Supported versions that are affected are 12.2.0.1 and 18c. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows low privileged attacker having Local Logon privilege with logon to the infrastructure where Core RDBMS executes to compromise Core RDBMS. Successful attacks require human interaction from a person other than the attacker and while the vulnerability is in Core RDBMS, attacks may significantly impact additional products. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in takeover of Core RDBMS. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 8.2 (Confidentiality, Integrity and Availability impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:L/AC:L/PR:L/UI:R/S:C/C:H/I:H/A:H).
Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已发布升级补丁以修复漏洞，补丁获取链接: https://www.oracle.com/technetwork/security-advisory/cpujan2019-5072801.html

Vulnerability.name: Oracle数据库:重要补丁更新 - 2019年1月(CVE-2019-2547)
Vulnerability.Description: Vulnerability in the Java VM component of Oracle Database Server. Supported versions that are affected are 11.2.0.4, 12.1.0.2, 12.2.0.1 and 18c. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows low privileged attacker having Create Session, Create Procedure privilege with network access via multiple protocols to compromise Java VM. Successful attacks require human interaction from a person other than the attacker. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized ability to cause a partial denial of service (partial DOS) of Java VM. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 3.5 (Availability impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:L/PR:L/UI:R/S:U/C:N/I:N/A:L).
Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已发布升级补丁以修复漏洞，补丁获取链接: https://www.oracle.com/technetwork/security-advisory/cpujan2019-5072801.html

Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已经发布了升级补丁以修复此安全问题，补丁获取链接： http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/topics/security/cpujuly2011-313328.html

Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已经发布了升级补丁以修复此安全问题，补丁获取链接： http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/topics/security/cpujul2012-392727.html

Vulnerability.name: Oracle数据库: 高危补丁更新 - 2012年7月(CVE-2012-1746)
Vulnerability.Description: 基于Windows系统的上运行时，Oracle Database Server 10.2.0.3, 10.2.0.4, 10.2.0.5, 11.1.0.7, 11.2.0.2 和 11.2.0.3版本中Network Layer组件上的未明漏洞，允许远程攻击者通过未知向量影响可用性，这是与CVE-2012-1747不同的漏洞。
Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已经发布了升级补丁以修复此安全问题，补丁获取链接： http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/topics/security/cpujul2012-392727.html

Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已经发布了升级补丁以修复此安全问题，补丁获取链接： http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/topics/security/cpujul2014-1972956.html

Vulnerability.name: Oracle数据库: 高危补丁更新 - 2016年7月(CVE-2015-0204)
Vulnerability.Description: OpenSSL 0.9.8zd之前版本,1.0.0至1.0.0p及1.0.1至1.0.1k中s3_clnt.c所含的ssl3_get_key_exchange函数可允许远程SSL服务器通过提供不兼容角色的短暂弱RSA密钥来进行RSA-to-EXPORT_RSA降级攻击及促进暴力破解。此漏洞与"FREAK"漏洞有关。备注：此CVE的范围限于基于OpenSSL的客户端代码，而非与服务器或其他TLS实现有关的EXPORT_RSA漏洞。
Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已经发布了升级补丁以修复此安全问题，补丁获取链接： https://www.openssl.org/news/secadv_20150108.txt

Vulnerability.name: Oracle数据库: 高危补丁更新 - 2016年7月(CVE-2015-0204)

Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已经发布了升级补丁以修复此安全问题，补丁获取链接： https://www.openssl.org/news/secadv_20150108.txt

Vulnerability.name: Oracle 数据库: 关键补丁更新 - 2017年7月 (CVE-2014-3566)
Vulnerability.Description: The SSL protocol 3.0, as used in OpenSSL through 1.0.1i and other products, uses nondeterministic CBC padding, which makes it easier for man-in-the-middle attackers to obtain cleartext data via a padding-oracle attack, aka the "POODLE" issue.
Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已经发布了升级补丁以修复此安全问题，补丁获取链接： https://www.openssl.org/news/

Vulnerability.name: Oracle 数据库: 关键补丁更新 - 2017年7月 (CVE-2016-2183)
Vulnerability.Description: The DES and Triple DES ciphers, as used in the TLS, SSH, and IPSec protocols and other protocols and products, have a birthday bound of approximately four billion blocks, which makes it easier for remote attackers to obtain cleartext data via a birthday attack against a long-duration encrypted session, as demonstrated by an HTTPS session using Triple DES in CBC mode, aka a "Sweet32" attack.
Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已经发布了升级补丁以修复此安全问题，补丁获取链接： https://www.openssl.org/blog/blog/2016/08/24/sweet32/

Vulnerability.name: Oracle 数据库: 关键补丁更新 - 2017年7月 (CVE-2017-10120)
Vulnerability.Description: Vulnerability in the RDBMS Security component of Oracle Database Server. The supported version that is affected is 12.1.0.2. Difficult to exploit vulnerability allows high privileged attacker having Create Session, Select Any Dictionary privilege with logon to the infrastructure where RDBMS Security executes to compromise RDBMS Security. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized update, insert or delete access to some of RDBMS Security accessible data. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 1.9 (Integrity impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:L/AC:H/PR:H/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:L/A:N).
Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已发布升级补丁以修复漏洞，补丁获取链接： http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/security-advisory/cpujul2017-3236622.html

Vulnerability.name: Oracle 数据库: 关键补丁更新 - 2017年7月 (CVE-2017-10202)
Vulnerability.Description: Vulnerability in the OJVM component of Oracle Database Server. Supported versions that are affected are 11.2.0.4, 12.1.0.2 and 12.2.0.1. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows low privileged attacker having Create Session, Create Procedure privilege with network access via multiple protocols to compromise OJVM. While the vulnerability is in OJVM, attacks may significantly impact additional products. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in takeover of OJVM. Note: This score is for Windows platforms. On non-Windows platforms Scope is Unchanged, giving a CVSS Base Score of 8.8. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 9.9 (Confidentiality, Integrity and Availability impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:L/PR:L/UI:N/S:C/C:H/I:H/A:H).
Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已发布升级补丁以修复漏洞，补丁获取链接： http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/security-advisory/cpujul2017-3236622.html

Vulnerability.name: Oracle Database: 关键补丁更新 - 2018年7月 (CVE-2017-15095)
Vulnerability.Description: A deserialization flaw was discovered in the jackson-databind in versions before 2.8.10 and 2.9.1, which could allow an unauthenticated user to perform code execution by sending the maliciously crafted input to the readValue method of the ObjectMapper. This issue extends the previous flaw CVE-2017-7525 by blacklisting more classes that could be used maliciously.
Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已发布升级补丁以修复漏洞，补丁获取链接： https://github.com/FasterXML/jackson-databind/issues/1737

Vulnerability.name: Oracle Database: 关键补丁更新 - 2018年7月 (CVE-2018-2939)
Vulnerability.Description: Vulnerability in the Core RDBMS component of Oracle Database Server. Supported versions that are affected are 11.2.0.4, 12.1.0.2, 12.2.0.1, 18.1 and 18.2. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows low privileged attacker having Local Logon privilege with logon to the infrastructure where Core RDBMS executes to compromise Core RDBMS. While the vulnerability is in Core RDBMS, attacks may significantly impact additional products. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized creation, deletion or modification access to critical data or all Core RDBMS accessible data and unauthorized ability to cause a hang or frequently repeatable crash (complete DOS) of Core RDBMS. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 8.4 (Integrity and Availability impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:L/AC:L/PR:L/UI:N/S:C/C:N/I:H/A:H).
Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已发布升级补丁以修复漏洞，补丁获取链接： http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/security-advisory/cpujul2018-4258247.html

Vulnerability.Description: Vulnerability in the Java VM component of Oracle Database Server. Supported versions that are affected are 11.2.0.4, 12.1.0.2,12.2.0.1 and 18.2. Vulnerability.name: Oracle数据库: 重要补丁更新 - July 2019 (CVE-2016-9572)
Vulnerability.Description: A NULL pointer dereference flaw was found in the way openjpeg 2.1.2 decoded certain input images. Due to a logic error in the code responsible for decoding the input image, an application using openjpeg to process image data could crash when processing a crafted image.
Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已发布升级补丁以修复漏洞，补丁获取链接： https://github.com/szukw000/openjpeg/commit/7b28bd2b723df6be09fe7791eba33147c1c47d0d

Vulnerability.name: Oracle数据库: 重要补丁更新 - 2019年7月 (CVE-2018-11058)
Vulnerability.Description: RSA BSAFE Micro Edition Suite, versions prior to 4.0.11 (in 4.0.x) and prior to 4.1.6 (in 4.1.x), and RSA BSAFE Crypto-C Micro Edition, version prior to 4.0.5.3 (in 4.0.x) contain a Buffer Over-Read vulnerability when parsing ASN.1 data. A remote attacker could use maliciously constructed ASN.1 data that would result in such issue.
Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已发布升级补丁以修复漏洞，详情请关注厂商主页： https://www.dellemc.com/

Vulnerability.name: Oracle数据库: 重要补丁更新 - 2019年7月 (CVE-2019-2569)
Vulnerability.Description: Vulnerability in the Core RDBMS component of Oracle Database Server. Supported versions that are affected are 11.2.0.4, 12.1.0.2 and 12.2.0.1. Difficult to exploit vulnerability allows high privileged attacker having Local Logon privilege with logon to the infrastructure where Core RDBMS executes to compromise Core RDBMS. Successful attacks require human interaction from a person other than the attacker. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized access to critical data or complete access to all Core RDBMS accessible data. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 4.0 (Confidentiality impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:L/AC:H/PR:H/UI:R/S:U/C:H/I:N/A:N).
Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已发布升级补丁以修复漏洞，补丁获取链接： https://www.oracle.com/technetwork/security-advisory/cpujul2019-5072835.html

Vulnerability.Description: Vulnerability in the Java VM component of Oracle Database Server. Supported versions that are affected are 11.2.0.4, 12.1.0.2, 12.2.0.1, 18c and 19c. Difficult to exploit vulnerability allows low privileged attacker having Create Session, Create Procedure privilege with network access via multiple protocols to compromise Java VM. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized creation, deletion or modification access to critical data or all Java VM accessible data and unauthorized ability to cause a hang or frequently repeatable crash (complete DOS) of Java VM. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 6.8 (Integrity and Availability impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:H/PR:L/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:H/A:H).
Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已发布升级补丁以修复漏洞，补丁获取链接： https://www.oracle.com/technetwork/security-advisory/cpujul2019-5072835.html

Vulnerability.name: Oracle数据库: 重要补丁更新 - July 2019 (CVE-2019-2753)
Vulnerability.Description: Vulnerability in the Oracle Text component of Oracle Database Server. Supported versions that are affected are 11.2.0.4, 12.1.0.2, 12.2.0.1 and 18c. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows low privileged attacker having Create Session privilege with network access via OracleNet to compromise Oracle Text. Successful attacks require human interaction from a person other than the attacker. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized read access to a subset of Oracle Text accessible data and unauthorized ability to cause a partial denial of service (partial DOS) of Oracle Text. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 4.6 (Confidentiality and Availability impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:L/PR:L/UI:R/S:U/C:L/I:N/A:L).
Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已发布升级补丁以修复漏洞，补丁获取链接： https://www.oracle.com/technetwork/security-advisory/cpujul2019-5072835.html

Vulnerability.name: Oracle数据库: 重要补丁更新 - July 2019 (CVE-2019-2776)
Vulnerability.Description: Vulnerability in the Core RDBMS component of Oracle Database Server. Supported versions that are affected are 12.1.0.2, 12.2.0.1, 18c and 19c. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows high privileged attacker having Create Any Index privilege with network access via OracleNet to compromise Core RDBMS. While the vulnerability is in Core RDBMS, attacks may significantly impact additional products. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized access to critical data or complete access to all Core RDBMS accessible data as well as unauthorized update, insert or delete access to some of Core RDBMS accessible data. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 7.6 (Confidentiality and Integrity impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:L/PR:H/UI:N/S:C/C:H/I:L/A:N).
Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已发布升级补丁以修复漏洞，补丁获取链接： https://www.oracle.com/technetwork/security-advisory/cpujul2019-5072835.html

Vulnerability.name: Oracle数据库: 重要补丁更新 - 2019-07 (CVE-2019-2799)
Vulnerability.Description: Vulnerability in the Oracle ODBC Driver component of Oracle Database Server<span class=font-red><b> ***PRIVILEGE CANNOT BE NONE FOR AUTHENTICATED ATTACKS***</b></span>. Supported versions that are affected are 11.2.0.4, 12.1.0.2, 12.2.0.1 and 18c. Difficult to exploit vulnerability allows low privileged attacker having None privilege with network access via multiple protocols to compromise Oracle ODBC Driver. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in takeover of Oracle ODBC Driver. Note: The vulnerability affects Windows platforms only. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 7.5 (Confidentiality, Integrity and Availability impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:H/PR:L/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:H/A:H).
Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已发布升级补丁以修复漏洞，补丁获取链接： https://www.oracle.com/technetwork/security-advisory/cpujul2019-5072835.html

Vulnerability.name: Oracle数据库: 高危补丁更新 - 2010年10月(CVE-2010-1321)
Vulnerability.Description: MIT Kerberos 5 (又名 krb5)至1.7.1 版本和1.8至1.8.2版本的GSS-API库中的krb5/accept_sec_context.c里的kg_accept_krb5函数，如用于kadmind和其他应用程序一样，么有正确检查无效的GSS-API令牌，这允许远程认证用户通过AP-REQ信息导致拒绝服务(空指针引用和守护进程崩溃)，其中认证的checksum字段丢失。
Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已经发布了升级补丁以修复这个安全问题，补丁下载链接： Ubuntu Ubuntu Linux 9.10 sparc Ubuntu krb5-telnetd_1.7dfsg~beta3-1ubuntu0.6_sparc.deb Vulnerability.name: Oracle数据库: 高危补丁更新 - 2010年10月(CVE-2010-1321)
Vulnerability.Description: MIT Kerberos 5 (又名 krb5)至1.7.1 版本和1.8至1.8.2版本的GSS-API库中的krb5/accept_sec_context.c里的kg_accept_krb5函数，如用于kadmind和其他应用程序一样，么有正确检查无效的GSS-API令牌，这允许远程认证用户通过AP-REQ信息导致拒绝服务(空指针引用和守护进程崩溃)，其中认证的checksum字段丢失。
Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已经发布了升级补丁以修复这个安全问题，补丁下载链接： Ubuntu Ubuntu Linux 9.10 sparc Ubuntu krb5-telnetd_1.7dfsg~beta3-1ubuntu0.6_sparc.deb http://ports.ubuntu.com/pool/universe/k/krb5/krb5-telnetd_1.7dfsg~beta 3-1ubuntu0.6_sparc.deb Ubuntu libgssrpc4_1.7dfsg~beta3-1ubuntu0.6_sparc.deb http://ports.ubuntu.com/pool/main/k/krb5/libgssrpc4_1.7dfsg~beta3-1ubu ntu0.6_sparc.deb Ubuntu libkadm5clnt6_1.7dfsg~beta3-1ubuntu0.6_sparc.deb Vulnerability.name: Oracle数据库: 高危补丁更新 - 2010年10月(CVE-2010-2389)
Vulnerability.Description: Oracle Database Server 11.2.0.1，11.1.0.7，10.2.0.3，10.2.0.4，10.1.0.5版本以及Fusion Middleware 11.1.1.1.0和11.1.1.2.0版本的Perl组件中的未明漏洞允许本地用户可通过与 Local Logon相关的未知向量影响完整性。
Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已经发布了升级补丁以修复此安全问题，补丁获取链接： http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/topics/security/cpuoct2010-175626.html

Vulnerability.name: Oracle数据库: 高危补丁更新 - 2012年10月(CVE-2012-3137)

Vulnerability.name: Oracle数据库: 高危补丁更新 - 2013年10月(CVE-2011-3389)
Vulnerability.Description: SSL协议，如用于Microsoft Windows and Microsoft Internet Explorer, Mozilla Firefox, Google Chrome, Opera和其他产品的某些配置中，通过使用含链初始化向量的CBC模式加密数据，允许中间人攻击者获取明文HTTP标头，通过HTTPS会话上顺时针钻责编街攻击(BCBA)，与使用(1)HTML5 WebSocket API, (2)Java URLConnection API, 或 (3)Silverlight WebClient API的JavaScript代码联接，又叫"BEAST"攻击。
Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已经发布了升级补丁以修复此安全问题，补丁获取链接： http://www.opera.com/?ref=home

Vulnerability.name: Oracle数据库: 高危补丁更新 - 2013年10月(CVE-2013-0169)
Vulnerability.Description: 用于OpenSSL, OpenJDK, PolarSSL,和其他产品中的TLS协议1.1和1.2版本和DTLS协议1.0和1.2版本，在格式错误的CBC填充处理时，不正确考虑MAC检查需求上的定时册信道攻击，允许远程攻击者通过特制数据包的定时数据统计分析来进行区分攻击和明文恢复攻击，又叫"Lucky Thirteen"事件。
Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已经发布了升级补丁以修复此安全问题，补丁获取链接： http://www.openssl.org/news/secadv_20130204.txt

Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已经发布了升级补丁以修复此安全问题，补丁获取链接： http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/topics/security/cpuoct2014-1972960.html

Vulnerability.name: Oracle 数据库: 关键补丁更新 - 2017年10月 (CVE-2016-6814)
Vulnerability.Description: When an application with unsupported Codehaus versions of Groovy from 1.7.0 to 2.4.3, Apache Groovy 2.4.4 to 2.4.7 on classpath uses standard Java serialization mechanisms, e.g. to communicate between servers or to store local data, it was possible for an attacker to bake a special serialized object that will execute code directly when deserialized. All applications which rely on serialization and do not isolate the code which deserializes objects were subject to this vulnerability.
Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已发布升级补丁以修复漏洞，补丁获取链接： http://mail-archives.apache.org/mod_mbox/www-announce/201701.mbox/%3CCADRx3PMZ2hBCGDTY35zYXFGaDnjAs0tc5-upaVs6QN2sYUejyA%40mail.gmail.com%3E

Vulnerability.name: Oracle 数据库: 关键补丁更新 - 2017年10月 (CVE-2016-6814)
Vulnerability.Description: When an application with unsupported Codehaus versions of Groovy from 1.7.0 to 2.4.3, Apache Groovy 2.4.4 to 2.4.7 on classpath uses standard Java serialization mechanisms, e.g. to communicate between servers or to store local data, it was possible for an attacker to bake a special serialized object that will execute code directly when deserialized. All applications which rely on serialization and do not isolate the code which deserializes objects were subject to this vulnerability.
Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已发布升级补丁以修复漏洞，补丁获取链接： http://mail-archives.apache.org/mod_mbox/www-announce/201701.mbox/%3CCADRx3PMZ2hBCGDTY35zYXFGaDnjAs0tc5-upaVs6QN2sYUejyA%40mail.gmail.com%3E

Vulnerability.name: Oracle 数据库: 关键补丁更新 - 2017年10月 (CVE-2016-8735)
Vulnerability.Description: Remote code execution is possible with Apache Tomcat before 6.0.48, 7.x before 7.0.73, 8.x before 8.0.39, 8.5.x before 8.5.7, and 9.x before 9.0.0.M12 if JmxRemoteLifecycleListener is used and an attacker can reach JMX ports. The issue exists because this listener wasn't updated for consistency with the CVE-2016-3427 Oracle patch that affected credential types.
Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已经发布了升级补丁以修复此安全问题，补丁获取链接： http://tomcat.apache.org/security-6.html http://tomcat.apache.org/security-7.html http://tomcat.apache.org/security-8.html http://tomcat.apache.org/security-9.html

Vulnerability.name: Oracle 数据库: 关键补丁更新 - 2017年10月 (CVE-2017-10190)
Vulnerability.Description: Vulnerability in the Java VM component of Oracle Database Server. Supported versions that are affected are 11.2.0.4, 12.1.0.2 and 12.2.0.1. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows high privileged attacker having Create Session, Create Procedure privilege with logon to the infrastructure where Java VM executes to compromise Java VM. While the vulnerability is in Java VM, attacks may significantly impact additional products. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in takeover of Java VM. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 8.2 (Confidentiality, Integrity and Availability impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:L/AC:L/PR:H/UI:N/S:C/C:H/I:H/A:H).
Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已发布升级补丁以修复漏洞，补丁获取链接： http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/security-advisory/cpuoct2017-3236626.html

Vulnerability.name: Oracle 数据库: 关键补丁更新 - 2017年10月 (CVE-2017-10261)
Vulnerability.Description: Vulnerability in the XML Database component of Oracle Database Server. Supported versions that are affected are 11.2.0.4 and 12.1.0.2. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows low privileged attacker having Create Session privilege with logon to the infrastructure where XML Database executes to compromise XML Database. While the vulnerability is in XML Database, attacks may significantly impact additional products. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized access to critical data or complete access to all XML Database accessible data. Note: This score is for Windows platform version 11.2.0.4 of Database. For Windows platform version 12.1.0.2 and Linux, the score is 5.5 with scope Unchanged. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 6.5 (Confidentiality impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:L/AC:L/PR:L/UI:N/S:C/C:H/I:N/A:N).
Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已发布升级补丁以修复漏洞，补丁获取链接： http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/security-advisory/cpuoct2017-3236626.html

Vulnerability.Description: Vulnerability in the RDBMS Security component of Oracle Database Server. Supported versions that are affected are 11.2.0.4, 12.1.0.2 and 12.2.0.1. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows high privileged attacker having Create User privilege with logon to the infrastructure where RDBMS Security executes to compromise RDBMS Security. Vulnerability.Description: Vulnerability in the Java VM component of Oracle Database Server. Supported versions that are affected are 11.2.0.4, 12.1.0.2, 12.2.0.1 and 18c. Vulnerability.name: Oracle数据库:重要补丁更新 - 2018年10月(CVE-2018-3299)
Vulnerability.Description: Vulnerability in the Oracle Text component of Oracle Database Server. Supported versions that are affected are 11.2.0.4, 12.1.0.2 and 12.2.0.1. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows unauthenticated attacker with network access via multiple protocols to compromise Oracle Text. Successful attacks require human interaction from a person other than the attacker and while the vulnerability is in Oracle Text, attacks may significantly impact additional products. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized ability to cause a hang or frequently repeatable crash (complete DOS) of Oracle Text as well as unauthorized update, insert or delete access to some of Oracle Text accessible data. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 8.2 (Integrity and Availability impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:R/S:C/C:N/I:L/A:H).
Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已发布升级补丁以修复漏洞，补丁获取链接： https://www.oracle.com/technetwork/security-advisory/cpuoct2018-4428296.html

Vulnerability.name: 缺少Oracle高危补丁更新(CPU) 2006年1月
Vulnerability.Description: Oracle Database Server 10.1.0.4.2版本, Application Server 10.1.2.0.2版本和 Collaboration Suite Release 2 9.0.4.2 (Oracle9i)版本上的未明漏洞有未指定影响和攻击向量，正如Oracle Vuln# DBC02在重组对象&转换表Spatial组件中所证实。
Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已经发布了升级补丁以修复这个安全问题，请到厂商的主页下载,下载并安装更新：https://www.oracle.com/security-alerts/

Vulnerability.name: 缺少Oracle高危补丁更新(CPU) 2007年1月
Vulnerability.Description: OpenSSL 0.9.7至0.9.7版本和0.9.8至0.9.8d版本的SSL_get_shared_ciphers函数中的缓冲区溢出有不确定的影响和包含长串密码的远程攻击向量。
Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已经发布了升级补丁以修复这个安全问题，请到厂商的主页下载,下载并安装更新：https://www.oracle.com/security-alerts/

Vulnerability.Description: 用于Apache，Sun和BEA Product Suite 10.3版本，10.0 MP1版本，9.2 MP3，9.1，9.0，8.1 SP6和7.0 SP7版本的IIS Web服务器组件的Oracle BEA WebLogic Server插件中的未明漏洞允许远程攻击者通过未知向量影响保密性，完整性和可用性。
Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已经发布了升级补丁以修复这个安全问题，请到厂商的主页下载,下载并安装更新：https://www.oracle.com/security-alerts/

Vulnerability.name: 缺少Oracle高危补丁更新(CPU) 2005年10月
Vulnerability.Description: Oracle Reports Server 10g (9.0.4.3.3)中test.jsp存在多个跨站脚本（XSS）漏洞允许远程攻击者通过（1）desname或（2）repprod参数注入任意web脚本或HTML。
Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已经发布了升级补丁以修复此安全问题，补丁获取链接： http://www1.itrc.hp.com/service/cki/docDisplay.do?hpweb_printable=true&docId=c00593668" target="_blank"

Vulnerability.name: 缺少Oracle高危补丁更新(CPU) 2006年10月
Vulnerability.Description: 当在全局虚拟主机配置中使用"SSLVerifyClient optional"时，mod_ssl2.8.24之前版本的ssl_engine_kernel.c,不能在每个位置下强制"SSLVerifyClient 要求"，这允许远程攻击者绕过访问限制。

Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已经发布了升级补丁以修复这个安全问题，请到厂商的主页下载,下载并安装更新：https://www.oracle.com/security-alerts/

Vulnerability.name: Oracle数据库过时版本
Vulnerability.Description: Oracle Database Server的过时版本正在运行。Oracle只产生产品版本中的针对大多数最新修补程序级别的修复。因此，如果服务器在旧修补程序集上运行，若不先升级至应用较新的修补程序集，关键的安全修补程序无法运行。Oracle的过时的版本可能会受到缓冲区溢出攻击，SQL注入，TNS监听器漏洞，跨站点脚本攻击和目录遍历攻击。建议您升级或修补安装Oracle Database至最新可用的更新。
Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商还没有提供此漏洞的相关补丁或者升级程序，建议使用此软件的用户随时关注厂商的主页以获取最新版本： https://www.alice-dsl.de/

Vulnerability.name: Oracle数据库:安全警报 - 2018年8月(CVE-2018-3110)
Vulnerability.Description: A vulnerability was discovered in the Java VM component of Oracle Database Server. Supported versions that are affected are 11.2.0.4, 12.1.0.2, 12.2.0.1 and 18. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows low privileged attacker having Create Session privilege with network access via Oracle Net to compromise Java VM. While the vulnerability is in Java VM, attacks may significantly impact additional products. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in takeover of Java VM. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 9.9 (Confidentiality, Integrity and Availability impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:L/PR:L/UI:N/S:C/C:H/I:H/A:H).
Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已发布升级补丁以修复漏洞，补丁获取链接： http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/security-advisory/alert-cve-2018-3110-5032149.html

Vulnerability.name: Oracle XDB.XDB_PITRIG_PKG.PITRIG_DROPMETADATA过程参数缓冲区溢出
Vulnerability.Description: Oracle 10g R2版本的XDB.xDB_PITRIG_PKG.PITRIG_DROPMETADATA过程中的缓冲区溢出允许远程认证用户通过一个长(1) OWNER 或(2) NAME参数来执行任意代码。
Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已经发布了升级补丁以修复这个安全问题，请到厂商的主页下载,下载并安装更新：https://www.oracle.com/security-alerts/
